scripts.dev: env-cmd --silent concurrently -c 'auto' -n 'api-interface,api,client' 'yarn workspace api-interface dev' 'yarn workspace api dev' 'yarn workspace client dev'
scripts.build: env-cmd --silent yarn workspace api-interface build && concurrently -c 'auto' -n 'api,client' 'yarn workspace api build' 'yarn workspace client build'
